The idea is cool, but I feel that any "serious" Leona skin needs to be wearing some kind of armor.  Pool Party gets a pass because it's a joke skin, but her being a knight is pretty vital to her character.  Have her run around in an evening dress and it just doesn't feel like Leona anymore.

Skins are generally non-canon anyway. If you're giving a pass on her Pool Party skin, it's easy to give pass on another skin that doesn't showcase her armor. 

I mean, look at Reaper Soraka. Why make a reaper skin for Soraka when the champion is all about saving people's lives and heal people? It's so out of her character but they made a dark skin for her regardless.

Actually I think reaper is a perfect skin. It's a Raka taken over by the shadow isles but she still acts as a healer for them.

This isn't an issue with the theme of the skin, but rather with the execution of the theme.  I can give a pass for Pool Party Leona because it's supposed to be funny that she's going into battle wearing a bathing suit.  So unless the idea is that I'm supposed to be laughing at her walking around in a tattered dress, I'm not sold on this being a good time to depart from Leona's identity as a knight in shining armor.
